page.title: 05NEW INVENTIONS
page.content: This is about new inventions. One new invention is the computer. Personal computers were introduced about 1980. Now in 1985 there are lots of computers Another new invention is the video recorder. You use it to record T.V. programmes so that you can watch them later. Now in 1985 there are a lot of them. The video-recorder is also used for video-games. The video-game was made in 1978. Now most of the video-games are in arcades and pubs. The Red Lion in Warmington has a pentathlon sports video-game. On a computer we can do all sorts of things. We can sort data into order. We can look for information and print it out. We can search for words. We can store data and retrieve it, as we are doing now on the Domesday Project. Written by Julian Fisher.
